name: apply(batchSize:inputA:inputB:output:for:)
desc: Applies the layer to a set of input objects and writes the result to a set of output objects, where the first layer accepts two inputs.
declaration: func apply(batchSize: Int, inputA: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, inputB: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, for learningPhase: BNNS.LearningPhase) throws
